sentences.en: And should be able to recoup some of this investment.
sentences.cn: 并应能获得部分此投资.

sentences.en: And therefore, recoup some of its lost revenues from television.
sentences.cn: 以此弥补电视转播权收入方面的损失.

sentences.en: He was desperate to try and recoup his losses.
sentences.cn: 他不顾一切地试图挽回损失。

sentences.en: I shall recoup my travelling expenses from my employers.
sentences.cn: 我将在雇主那儿报销我的旅行费用.

sentences.en: I will recoup you for any money you spend.
sentences.cn: 你所用掉的钱我将如数付还.

sentences.en: Insurance companies are trying to recoup their losses by increasing premiums.
sentences.cn: 保险公司正试图通过提高保费来弥补损失。

sentences.en: It took the firm five years to recoup its losses.
sentences.cn: 这个公司5年后才挽回损失.

sentences.en: Only artificial recoup their losses investment sued According to U.
sentences.cn: 投资人为挽回损失只有提起诉讼.

sentences.en: Rejection will not recoup him for what he has paid out.
sentences.cn: 退货不能补偿他花出去的钱.

sentences.en: Some schemes can take more than 20 years recoup the investment.
sentences.cn: 一些绿色能源方案需要20年以上才能回收成本.

sentences.en: The company has been forced to sell land to recoup some of the losses.
sentences.cn: 公司被迫出售土地以弥补部分损失.

sentences.en: The insurance company will recoup the farmers for the loss caused by the flood.
sentences.cn: 保险公司将就洪水速成的损失给农民们以补偿.

sentences.en: The insurance company will recoup you for any loss you have.
sentences.cn: 你所用的损失保险公司将如数偿还.

sentences.en: The movie will have to be a huge hit to recoup its cost.
sentences.cn: 这部电影必须大获成功才能收回成本。

sentences.en: The need to recoup such costs necessitated long film runs.
sentences.cn: 收回这些成本需要影片长期放映.

sentences.en: They are to recoup themselves for their losses.
sentences.cn: 他们正在设法挽回他们的损失.

trans.tran_en: to get back an amount of money you have lost or spent
to get back an amount of money you have lost or spent

trans.tran_cn: 补偿，收回，偿还，[法]扣除，扣留
trans.tran_en: to get back an amount of money you have lost or spent
